plot: An Istanbul night event is the backdrop for an unlikely couple to meet and head out to Southern Turkey to get away from it all. Not knowing the car they borrowed contains some critical CD's...
title: En Mutlu Oldugum Yer
plot_es: An Istanbul night event is the backdrop for an unlikely couple to meet and head out to Southern Turkey to get away from it all. Not knowing the car they borrowed contains some critical CD's...
plot_en: An Istanbul night event is the backdrop for an unlikely couple to meet and head out to Southern Turkey to get away from it all. Not knowing the car they borrowed contains some critical CD's...
